pandae667 wrote:
> --- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, Michael Stack <stack@...> wrote:
> >
> > pandae667 wrote:
> > ...
>
> that would be really helpfull. That way I could just unpack a new
> heritrix version (for as long as configurations don't change
> significantly) and update my symlink.
I've added an RFE: 
http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=1485819&group_id=73833&atid=539102.  
Shouldn't be hard to do.  Most other disk locations are already 
configurable by passing system properties.

If you want to try it yourself, here is how we get the conf dir: 
http://crawler.archive.org/xref/org/archive/crawler/Heritrix.html#1364. 
For examples of our favoring system property settings if present, from 
the same src file, see: 
http://crawler.archive.org/xref/org/archive/crawler/Heritrix.html#665.

St.Ack
